details.content:
import sys
import time as T
# be it monad or anything. just show me how?
while True:
    line = sys.stdin.readline()
    print("line received!\n",T.time(),line)
    # how do you predict the next move? i don't care how the fuck you're gonna do the next. show me how.
    # next, get me the words that i am currently typing. show the relationship somehow.
